content.description:
Sticky's Arete is really more like two obtuse aretes that form a big blunt prow. Stand start right hand on the good hold that also serves as the left gaston for Pregnancy Arete, and a slopey sidepull for the left hand that is located just above the roof feature. Compress up the prow, and throw for the lip.

Seems hard for the grade to me, but thems the brakes I guess.

There is also a sit start that goes at V9.
content.location: Between Pregnancy Arete and Skinless Dyno.

content.description: Start as for leftover lover, go right to the pockets on 1000 lb caboose, knee scum helpful, then somehow make a large gaston to a sidepull and jump to the jug on Kick Start. Finish as for Kick Start. Cool holds, and decent movement, but obviously totally contrived = 2 stars.
content.location: Start as for Leftover lover, on opposing sidepull jugs, go hard right into start of 1000 lb Â caboose and hit the jug on Kick Start.

content.description: One-move-wonder dyno off of small holds: left hand sidepull crimp, high right hand slimper, then jugs on the lip. Generating off of the weird smeary little feet is cruxy.
content.protection: Reaching the start holds may require a pad stack for the shorties.
content.location: Between the shot hole traverse and pregnancy arete.

content.description: Start with your left hand on a decent hold at about head height, and right hand in good undercling down low.  Move to the small holds midway up.  From here get to the top by using the smaller holds above or dyno.
content.location: To the right of Kick Start and to the left of Double Crimp

content.description: Locate the two DOT blast holes around the corner from the the side facing the road.  Start far left on some slopers and traverse right until you have a your left hand in the rightmost shot hole and right gaston.  Huck for the lip.

Start standing with the left hand on a crimpy gaston and the right hand on a not so great undercling/sidepull. Place your right foot onto a very good, but very high, ledge. Pull off the ground and balance your way to the top using a few small crimps.

Really quite good!

Edit: I recently found out that the first ascentionist started with both hands matched on the crimpy gaston described above and then moved right to the undercling, continuing up from there. So, this should be considered the original/valid starting position.
content.location: Far left end of the road side face. Left of 'Leftover Lover'.

content.description: Sit start from two good jugs to an obvious chalked flake.  Body tension and/or huck to the top.  Technical and fun.  Once you have the beta dialed, its easy.
content.protection: Maybe a pad.  Good landing though
content.location: On the Flat Top boulder, facing the main parking area.  Look for a miniature cave next to the name "Trujillo" written on the rock.

content.description: Traverse the entire boulder.  Speed is key.
content.location: flat top boulder, facing the road.

content.description: On the left of Flat Top boulder.  It is the easiest problem on the left side of the boulder.
content.location: flat top boulder, facing the road.

content.description:
Start below the obvious jug of 'Kick Start' on a left hand sidepull and a right hand crimp, both around 4.5 feet. Pull off the ground and make a dynamic move to the jug above. Finish as for 'Kick Start'.

A little awkward, but more satisfying than the jump start of 'Kick Start'.
content.location: On the right end of the road side face. Start below the obvious jug. Just left of 'Silly Wabbit'.

content.description: On side facing the road, jump to the large jug.
content.location: Flat top boulder facing the road.

content.description: NE corner.  Can be done statically as well.
content.location: NE corner of Flat Top boulder

content.description: Start matched on an obvious long crimp to the right of Silly Wabbit.  Move up to a decent right hand, and left hand to the small crimp next to it, top out.
content.location: To the left of Mr. Trujillo's Big Day, and to the right of Silly Wabbit

content.description: Just left of Kick Start one can find two sloping crimpers on a subtle horizontal break at about 7-8 feet. Grab the crimps and one move wonder it to the top.
content.location: Boulder closer to the road...right next to the Chaos Boulder.

content.description:
Start sitting on an assortment of interesting pockets. Move up and slight left through some of the coolest pockets around. Find some tiny crimps above and step up towards a small two finger crimp located in a vertical seam. Finish it off.

Avoid using the big foot (and hand holds) out left.
content.location: Located in the middle of the road side face, right of 'Leftover Lover' and left of 'Kick Start'. The unique starting pockets are fairly obvious.
